entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as a student in Professor McGonagall's class. He is mentioned as receiving a talking-to from the professor.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is introduced as the teacher of Transfiguration class. She is described as giving a warning to her students and demonstrating complex magic.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as being able to successfully transform a match into a needle in Professor McGonagall's class.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Professor Quirrell is introduced as the teacher of Defence Against the Dark Arts class. His lessons are described as disappointing to the students.
